OUTLINE : This prospective , randomize , control , longitudinal study . Patients randomize 1 2 intervention arm . - Arm I : Patients undergo resistance exercise via negative-eccentric work ( RENEW ) , use special seated stationary leg exercise machine , 3 time week 12 week . Exercise exertion duration gradually increase weekly first 4-5 week RENEW . - Arm II : Patients receive standard care . In arm , fatigue , weakness , physical activity , functional status , muscle structure function , mobility assess baseline 12 week completion study intervention .
